message: Let's start fair.  I take the lion's share, but you still get something.  Accept and we can both walk away with some cash.
I'll give you a decent share, but I'm not going to let you take the lion's share this time.
I'm willing to compromise.  This is a more even split, and we can end this game before inflation eats away too much of our potential gains.
I'll meet you in the middle, but I'm not going to give up my advantage just yet.
